text: Bɨ agobun anɨb okok, God kɨlop tɨtay agek, agak tek nep chɨnop gɨnɨgab agɨl, nop gos nɨg mɨdɨl mɨd dad amɨl kumɨlak. Ne agak anɨb ak ma nɨgɨlak. Pen gos awl anɨb ak ma nɨgɨlak, man ne kɨdek amɨl nɨgɨnɨgabun agɨl, tep gaknɨŋ mɨdɨl kumɨlak. Lum awl mɨdɨl agelɨgɨpal, Chɨn binɨb man ke okok nɨb ju apɨl mɨdɨl, binɨb adek okok ajɨl mɨdobun agelɨgɨpal.
